eatourist.title: Eatourist
eatourist.paragraph_1: A side project of a web application that helps restaurants bring in more clients in touristic places, digitize their menus and take orders and payments right from the web application.
eatourist.paragraph_2: Eatourist also offers restaurant owners the management of different restaurants, assign different managers for each restaurant and see advanced analytics like the number of visitors, number of orders and revenue that came from the app.
eatourist.link_description: Menu digitization and translation for restaurants

bagagevoyage.title: BagageVoyage
bagagevoyage.paragraph_2: where they are responsible for the marketing of the website and bringing users in.
bagagevoyage.paragraph_3: The platform give independent transporters the ability to post their services and get potential clients.
bagagevoyage.paragraph_4: This is also a place for people to find these kinds of services to have their items shipped to other countries for cheaper than what they can find else where.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph_1: A full stack web developer based in Tunisia. I have been designing and developing websites for the last 5 years where I delivered professional websites of all kinds.
about.paragraph_2: I am on the journey to find the balance of travelling and working.
about.join_my_newsletter_description: I share insights, thoughts and new discoveries every week through my newsletter
about.dont_worry_i_hate_spam_too: Don't worry, I won't spam you. I hate spam as much as you do.
